name: hydroponic tray
description: A hydroponic tray equipped with automatic light and water dispensers

name: filled hydroponic tray
description: A hydroponic tray filled with water, fertilizer and batteries. Ready to be planted

name: planted hydroponic blueberry
description: A planted hydroponic tray with blueberries. Activate to begin growth.

use_action.msg: You activate the hydroponics tray.

name: growing hydroponic blueberries
description: A hydroponic tray with a growing plant

use_action.msg: The plant has matured, you can now disassemble it to harvest the plant.

name: mature hydroponic blueberry
description: A mature plant, ready to be harvested
